extendedInfo.description: A brain melting game of strategy and tactics, with the Nobel prize for the winners and radiation poisoning for the losers! Pit your wits against the leading nuclear scientists in the field, or against a friend.The game includes a campaign, a random level generator and also some non-network multiplayer levels (for two players on the same device).(This game was previously called Chain Reaction, a name which may have suggested it was one of many clones of a certain type of game; it isn't, so the name has been changed!)

reviews.title: Update corrected problems!
reviews.comment: Last update resolved issues on 4.0 device. Great game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Go so far and it closes down disappointed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well made app
reviews.comment: The app is quite good, took a while to figure out strategies. The random level generator should have more options. Great game
reviews.author: Akshay Anand

reviews.title: Forces close
reviews.comment: Can\'t play campaign level \"The Clock Is Ticking\" and extra levels. Otherwise it\'s a great game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Novel and challenging
reviews.comment: Great app. Love the concept and the execution... and the puns!
reviews.author: Damian Marinaro

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Not too difficult, but not too easy. Fun 2 player game for single device, too. Needs more levels, or some type of way to create your own levels.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force close
reviews.comment: Force closes all the time made to the nobel level and cant get any further. Im extremely frustrated bout this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Loved it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force closes...
reviews.comment: Force closes on the career level \"Pop The Corks\", uninstalled. Samsung galaxy Y.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game.
reviews.comment: Short and easy pick up and put down as required. Happy to recommend.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: Was worth my time. DroidX

reviews.comment: awesome game. took a few goes to get my head round it but its worth persevering with. would be good to have remote 2-player, like cestos
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Too much trial and error required. Not knowing how many particles it will take to create a chain reaction is a huge point against this game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: fun game, great idea.. the AI knows too much. if it can know what number of particles belong to what boxes then so should we.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great like new age checkers needs more levels and 4 person multi player
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: One of the best gmes so far. A bit too short, tho.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs more levels. A little confusing to figure out how to win, but by the last couple levels, you get the hag of it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No idea what I was doing, just randomly adding balls. Beat the first 3 levels in like ten seconds. Lol, dumb.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome game. If your finding it too easy then up the difficulty to Einstein intellect, gets really challenging
reviews.author: A Google User
